Sentencas: The present study aims to establish an integrated modelling and optimization framework for a combined power system comprising fuel cell, gas turbine and Organic Rankine Cycle (ORC).
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization

Sentencas: The method is based upon the coupling of a syngas fueled solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrid model and a bottoming supercritical ORC model developed using gPROMS to efficiently determine the range of appropriate operating conditions.
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization

Sentencas: A comprehensive and detailed analysis is carried out to simulate system behavior and to investigate the influence of key design and operating parameters on the system performance.
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization

Sentencas: The fuel flowrate and operating temperature of fuel cell, the pressure ratios of turbines, together with the flow split ratio of the ORC cycle are all set to be controllable variables.
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization

Sentencas: The results indicate that an electrical efficiency of 66.27% and a CHP efficiency of 88.43% are achievable for the integrated system.
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization

Sentencas: The analysis enables us to identify the system design tradeoffs, and therefore to determine optimal integration strategies for complex polygeneration systems.
Titulo: An efficient integration strategy for a SOFC-GT-SORC combined system with performance simulation and parametric optimization
